input: Which one of the following statements about the Parliament of India is not correct?

options.A: The Constitution provides for a parliamentary form of government
options.B: The foremost function of the parliament is to provide a cabinet
options.C: The membership of the cabinet is restricted to the lower house
options.D: The cabinet has to enjoy the confidence of the majority in the popular chamber

explanation: The membership of the cabinet is for both upper house and lower house.
